prepareScript:
echo '# workaround for flaky DNS
10.8.101.208 esxi2.satellite.lab.eng.rdu2.redhat.com
' | sudo tee -a /etc/hosts; sudo rm -f /etc/yum.repos.d/*.repo; sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/rhel8internal.repo <<EOT
[RHEL-8-NIGHTLY-BaseOS]
name=baseos
baseurl=http://download.devel.redhat.com/rhel-8/nightly/RHEL-8/latest-RHEL-8.8.0/compose/BaseOS/x86_64/os/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0

[RHEL-8-NIGHTLY-AppStream]
name=appstream
baseurl=http://download.devel.redhat.com/rhel-8/nightly/RHEL-8/latest-RHEL-8.8.0/compose/AppStream/x86_64/os/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0

[RHEL-8-NIGHTLY-CRB]
name=crb
baseurl=http://download.devel.redhat.com/rhel-8/nightly/RHEL-8/latest-RHEL-8.8.0/compose/CRB/x86_64/os/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0
EOT
